definition.text: Track the number of periods that have passed since the last occurrence of each type of event. On this page: Trigger On, Trigger Off, Take Position, Close Position, Next Phase, Move to Phase, Create Order, Cancel Order, Close Order.

translations.text: Отслеживайте количество периодов, прошедших с момента последнего появления каждого типа события. На этой странице: Trigger On, Trigger Off, Take Position, Close Position, Next Phase, Move to Phase, Create Order, Cancel Order, Close Order.

paragraphs.text: Foundations->Concept->Reusable Snippets->Note for Hierarchy Tables No Discussion
